      Methods in sorcer.core.monitor that throw MonitorException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void MonitorableSession.changed(Context ctx, IControlContext controlContext, int aspect)
      Providers use this method to update the monitoring session
      void MonitoringSession.changed(Context ctx, IControlContext controlContext, int aspect)
      Providers use this method to update the monitoring session
      Exertion MonitorUIManagement.getMonitorableExertion(UEID cookie, Principal credentials)
      For this reference ID, which references a exertion in a monitor, get the exertion if the principal has enough credentials.
      Exertion MonitorUIManagement.getMonitorableExertion(Uuid id, Principal credentials)
      For this reference ID, which references a exertion in a datastore, get the exertion if the client has enough credentials.
      Map<Uuid,ExertionInfo> MonitorUIManagement.getMonitorableExertionInfo(Exec.State aspect, Principal principal)
      The spec requires that this method gets all the monitorable exertion infos from all the monitor managers and return a Hashtable where key -> ExertionReferenceID value -> Some info regarding this exertion
      int MonitorableSession.getState()
      Providers use this method to find the state of this session

      int MonitorSessionManagement.getState(Uuid cookie) 
      void MonitorableSession.init(long duration, long timeout)
      If the Broker wants to drop the exertion to space, then the Broker has no idea who will pick up this exertion.

      If the Broker wants to drop the exertion to space, then the Broker has no idea who will pick up this exertion.

      void MonitorSessionManagement.init(Uuid cookie, long duration, long timeout)
      If the Broker wants to drop the exertion to space, then the Broker has no idea who will pick up this exertion.
